faqs.question: How do I get started with this template?
faqs.answer: Download the free template and duplicate it to your Notion workspace. Customize the mood categories to match how you describe your emotions, then start logging your mood daily. After a week or two, review the data to spot patterns. Set a daily reminder to make mood tracking a consistent habit.

faqs.question: What's included in this template?
faqs.answer: The template includes a mood logging system with quick-entry options, customizable mood categories, daily/weekly/monthly views for tracking over time, and visual displays to help identify emotional patterns. It's designed to be simple yet comprehensive for effective mood monitoring.

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! After duplicating, you can adjust mood categories to match your emotional experience, add context fields like sleep quality or activities, change the visual layout, set up different tracking frequencies, or integrate notes about what influenced each mood. Make it fit your mental health journey.

faqs.question: What are the main use cases?
faqs.answer: Use it to identify stress triggers by correlating moods with activities or events, track the effectiveness of mental health treatments or lifestyle changes, build self-awareness about emotional patterns you weren't consciously noticing, provide data for therapy sessions, or simply maintain emotional wellness through consistent check-ins.
